properties.implementation_description:
Following commands is part of the ADAScog. Instructions are summarised as follows:
"Receptive speech is assessed also on the patientâs ability to carry out one- to five-step commands.
1. Make a fist.
2. Point to the ceiling, then to the floor.
3. Put the pencil on top of the card, then put it back.
4. Put the watch on the other side of the pencil and turn over the card.
5. Tap each shoulder twice with two fingers, keeping your eyes shut."
